hc.server.util.scheduler

Class AnnualJobCalendar

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseJobCalendar
      • hc.server.util.scheduler.AnnualJobCalendar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobCalendar, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class AnnualJobCalendar
extends BaseJobCalendar
implements JobCalendar, java.io.Serializable

    This implementation of the JobCalendar excludes a set of days of the year. You may use it to exclude bank holidays which are on the same date every year.

    Author:
    Juergen Donnerstag
    See Also:
    JobCalendar

      • clone

        public java.lang.Object clone()
        Specified by:
        clone in interface JobCalendar

      • getDaysExcluded

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Calendar> getDaysExcluded()

        Get the array which defines the exclude-value of each day (java.util.Calendar) of month

      • getNextIncludedTime

        public long getNextIncludedTime(long timeStamp)

        Determine the next time (in milliseconds) that is 'included' by the JobCalendar after the given time. Return the original value if timeStamp is included. Return 0 if all days are excluded.

        Note that this JobCalendar is only has full-day precision.

        Specified by:
        getNextIncludedTime in interface JobCalendar

      • isDayExcluded

        public boolean isDayExcluded(java.util.Calendar day)

        Return true, if day (java.util.Calendar) is defined to be exluded.

      • isTimeIncluded

        public boolean isTimeIncluded(long timeStamp)

        Determine whether the given time (in milliseconds) is 'included' by the JobCalendar.

        Note that this JobCalendar is only has full-day precision.

        Specified by:
        isTimeIncluded in interface JobCalendar

      • removeExcludedDay

        public void removeExcludedDay(java.util.Calendar day)
        Remove the given day (java.util.Calendar) from the list of excluded days
        Parameters:
        day - the day to exclude

      • setDayExcluded

        public void setDayExcluded(java.util.Calendar day,
                  boolean exclude)

        Redefine a certain day (java.util.Calendar) to be excluded (true) or included (false).

      • setDaysExcluded

        public void setDaysExcluded(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Calendar> days)

        Redefine the list of days excluded. The ArrayList should contain java.util.Calendar objects.
